Set.Text: All coastal cities get a free Lighthouse. Units may cross mountains after the first Great General is earned, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a mountain.

All Civilizations are prevented from constructing new nuclear weapons (Atomic Bomb, Hydrogen Bomb, Nuclear ICBM, etc.). Weapons already constructed, however, are not disarmed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Advanced Ballistics.
